title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.107 - Emergency services category 2-major emergency hospital
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.107 - Emergency services category 2-major emergency hospital

State Regulations

In addition to meeting the qualifications for category 3
facility, a category 2 facility must also render resuscitation and extended
critical care to patients. Also, intensive nursing care and basic intensive
medical care, including 24- hour blood gas determinations and inhalation
therapy services should be available. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.107

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
